title: League dieing on me( Client Crash)
body: Anyone else have this problem? It wont crash in game and ive had it crash a few time in champ select luckily it didnt get me banned. But basically it seems to minimize itself with the animtaion it does, yet it isnt shown as open in the taskbar and to re-login i have to go to task manager and force close it. Halp lol i dont wanna risk getting banned from this xD

replies.body:
When your client disappears, it's likely because your client disconnected from the game platform service entirely. This is generally a result of a poor connection to the servers, so I recommend taking a look at our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your network config is up to spec for League.

Let me know if that caused any change.

My network config is fine, it hasnt changed in over a year and i never had this problem before. Now it seems to only crash when opening hextech crafting and occasionaly in the store.

Crashing in hextech crafting is generally tied to either Plays.tv, which can be disabled or uninstalled, or missing [windows updates](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/12373/windows-update-faq).

Let me know if either fixed it.
